description:
Beatwave lets you make amazing music simply by tapping.  Create songs anywhere, anytime on your iPhone or iPad. No musical skills required!

Using the Beatwave grid melodies and beats can be constructed easily and quickly. 

Whether you're new to music or are a pro Beatwave lets you explore sounds and create new and interesting tracks.

Feature Overview
----
- Hundreds of instruments: Beatwave includes 10 great instruments with over 200 available via download from the Beatwave store.
- Built in effects: Includes 12 audio effects for endless sound variations. 
- Always in key: With the Beatwave grid there are no wrong notes.
- Designed for iOS7: Created exclusively for iOS7 Beatwave looks stunning on your device.
- Record and share: Share your creations to the world via Twitter, Facebook, Email or Soundcloud.
- Multiple layers: Layer up to four instruments at once to create a complex sound.
- Ringtone creation: Easily save you tracks as ringtones for your iPhone.
- Audiobus 2 support.
- Universal download for iPhone and iPad.

Video
----
Watch the video to find out what it's all about: http://appcnct.me/s7

Contact
----
Any issues or suggestions please contact us at beatwave@collect3.com.au or @beatwaveapp on Twitter.
releaseNotes:
- Adds new drum generator feature. Lets you create a new and unique drum beat with a single tap of the screen. See it in action at http://vimeo.com/102598393
- Audiobus 2 support with state saving.
- Various bug fixes.
